title: Rect Sand Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: A 100% vegan cafe with a hot sandwich set menu which includes either soup or salad with the sandwich. Cakes are also available. Drinks are a range of coffees, teas (herbal and regular) and three beers, one non-alcoholic. Bread is whole grain. Pleasant homey atmosphere. Some English spoken, although the website is all in Japanese.
